title: LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image
body:
"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\release\0.0.0.103\deploy\zlib.dll is either not designed to run on windows or contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support."

I used this link to try solving my solution at the top comment here;
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/jbuoHIHf-leagueclientexe-bad-image

I tried to delete the LeagueOfLegends.exe and then I opened the admin thing, it let me launch it but after that it gave me the same message, so I had to restore the file and now I'm back to where I started, does anyone have another solution?

replies.body:
That solution used to be a pretty quick fix, but we noticed that problem would keep coming back sometimes so we need to take a few extra steps to make sure it doesn't keep happening. Essentially, those files are most likely getting blocked by a firewall/antivirus like McAfee. Let's temporarily disable/uninstill McAfee or whatever you have, and then reinstall League as well. 

Afterwards, reinstall League and then McAfee, and make sure you follow [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) to add exceptions for League's game files.

i thought no one was coming so i just uninstalled it and installed it again,
it's working pretty well and it's 50% on the client rn, I just need to wait an extended period of time rip
